title: Legendary Janna Skin Unobtained?
body: Ok so I play Lol on and off, and about a year back I rerolled three skins (one of which was a Janna skin shard) and got forecaster Janna! Now back then I didn't even know that it was a legendary, and I didn't even own Janna so I didn't really care. Now playing Janna and realizing what a good skin that is, I'm just curious, why don't I have it? I mean, I rerolled into permanent and got it, but if I don't own the champion does that mean I don't get it?

replies.body: I think I did activate permanent while I didn't have the champion. Didn't know what it would do. XD

Skins that you get from a reroll should be automatically added to your collection I believe, and if not you can click on them to redeem them. I checked all of your histories, even purchases and hextech rerolls as well, but I'm not seeing any trace of Forecaster Janna on this account. Could you be talking about a different account?
Did you activate the shard (unlock as skin permanent after the reroll)? Also, you didn't do so while not owning the champ, did you?
